front.title: Applicability Statement for Extensions to RSVP for LSP-Tunnels

abstract.t: This memo discusses the applicability of'Extensions to RSVP for LSPTunnels' [1]. It highlights the protocol's principles of operationand describes the network context for which it was designed.Guidelines for deployment are offered and known protocol limitationsare indicated. This document is intended to accompany the submissionof 'Extensions to RSVP for LSP Tunnels' onto the Internet standardstrack.
